How can i integrate the newsbreak pixel with shopify. I've done everything in hte help article and put through a test purchase with no luck. My checkout page use the sop.app domain so peorhaps thats the problem?

It sounds like you've followed the steps in the help article but are still facing issues. Since your checkout page uses the sop.app domain, it might be causing a problem with tracking. Make sure that your pixel code is correctly placed and that any domain-specific settings are configured to allow tracking. You can also try testing the pixel integration in Ad Manager or reach out to your account manager/operations team for verification and further testing. Here's the help article for reference: [How to install a NewsBreak Pixel on Shopify](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18551604763405-How-to-install-a-NewsBreak-Pixel-on-Shopify). If you continue to face issues, please email adsupport@newsbreak.com for more assistance.
